title: Kenalan dengan Fisioterapi Altius Hospitals!
content:
It's Time to Move On from Pain! Get to Know Altius Hospitals Physiotherapy

Combined with advanced technology, Altius Hospitals physiotherapy services are undoubtedly the best in their field. The physiotherapy equipment and services available are also equally impressive:

  • SIS (Super Inductive System): therapy using electromagnetic waves to stimulate muscles, joints, and nerves, thereby helping to reduce pain and joint stiffness.
  • FSWT (Focused Shock Wave Therapy): therapy for chronic conditions and deeper injuries, such as piriformis syndrome, plantar fasciitis, and calcification of the knees and waist.
  • Spinal Decompression: helps treat pinched nerves in the neck and waist, as well as scoliosis.
  • Emsella Treatment: strengthens weakened pelvic floor muscles, beneficial for urinary incontinence, sexual dysfunction, and improved bladder control.
  • Gym Physio: specialized physical exercises to maximize recovery through targeted exercise.

So, what are you waiting for? Try Altius Hospitals' physiotherapy services now and feel the difference!

(021) 3000 – 8877

When Your Health Is Our Top Priority

title: Altius Medical Check Up Package
content:
Altius Medical Check Up Package Updated!

Discover the latest Medical Check Up promotions from Altius Hospitals, tailored specifically to your needs!

MCU Packages

1. General MCU – Bronze

2. General MCU – Silver

3. General MCU – Platinum

4. General MCU – Diamond

5. Cardiac MCU – Silver

6. Cardiac MCU – Gold

7. Cardiac MCU – Diamond

8. Stroke Screening

9. Heart & Stroke (H&S) Screening

10. Premarital Package

11. Household Assistant Screening

Terms and Conditions for Angpao and Lantern Packages

1. Medical check-ups are conducted every Monday to Friday

2. Examinations and consultations are not tied to a specific doctor (according to the on-call schedule).

3. Examinations and consultations must be conducted on the same day.

4. Medical Check-Up Preparation:

  • Patients must fast for 8-10 hours before the examination (no food) and are only allowed to drink water
  • Women must not be menstruating
  • No smoking, consuming alcoholic beverages, or taking medication before the examination (while fasting)
  • For lab test results, hard copies will be submitted within 24 hours on working days, and MCU reports within 48 hours on working days.
  • Patients are required to make anappointment in advance

5. Meals depend on the package chosen

6. Medical Check-Up examinations cannot be conducted on red dates or public holidays

7. The 2025 rates are subject to change at any time and will be communicated if there are price changes

title: Paket MCU Skrining Urologi
content:
Unusual Urine? Time to Get Checked!

Enjoy the most comprehensive urology screening package offered by Altius Hospitals!

1. Basic Kidney Screening

Price: IDR 500,000 with the following examination components:
a. Consultation and physical examination with a Urology Specialist
b. Urology Ultrasound

2. Advanced Kidney Screening

Price: IDR 1,000,000 with the following examination components:
a. Consultation and physical examination with a Urology Specialist
b. Urology Ultrasound
c. Non-Contrast Urology CT Scan
d. Lab: Urea, Creatinine, Complete Urinalysis

3. Prostate Health Screening

Price: IDR 1,500,000 with the following examination components:
a. Consultation and physical examination with a Urology Specialist
b. Urology Ultrasound
c. Uroflowmetry
d. Lab: Urea, Creatinine, Complete Urinalysis, PSA (Prostate Specific Antigen)

Terms & Conditions

– Package prices do not include administrative fees.
– If there are additional examinations outside of the package, they will be charged according to the rates already in place at the hospital.

title: Promo Orthopedic, Total Knee Replacement!
content:
Regain Your Freedom of Movement with Altius Hospitals Bekasi!

Knee pain caused by arthritis, injury, or bone degeneration often hinders daily activities. Even simple movements such as walking, climbing stairs, or simply standing can be extremely painful. Now, Altius Hospitals Bekasi is here to help you regain your freedom of movement through the Total Knee Replacement Promotion with special prices and the best service.

Total Knee Replacement is a modern medical procedure that replaces a damaged knee joint with a high-quality artificial joint (prosthesis). This procedure is proven to be safe and effective in reducing pain, improving knee function, and enhancing the patient's quality of life.

At Altius Hospitals Bekasi, you will be treated by a team of experienced orthopedic specialists supported by the latest medical technology! With a patient-centered care approach, we ensure that every patient receives comprehensive consultation, personalized care, and post-operative recovery assistance.

Through this special promotion, we want more people to experience the real benefits of Total Knee Replacement without having to worry too much about the cost. Now is the time to reduce pain, regain independence, and enjoy precious moments with your beloved family again. Don't let knee pain limit your mobility. Take advantage of the Total Knee Replacement Promotion at Altius Hospitals Bekasi today. Consult now and start your journey towards a healthier, more active, and energetic life.

(021) 3000 – 8877

When Your Health is Our Utmost Priority

title: Exclusive Dental Check-Up Promo
content:
Healthy Smile, Healthy Life!

Your dental health is an essential part of your overall well-being. At Altius Hospitals, we provide comprehensive dental check-up services with advanced technology and experienced dentists.

Take advantage of our special promotion to ensure your teeth and gums stay strong, healthy, and free from disease.

What’s Included?

  • General dental consultation with a dentist
  • Scaling and polishing to remove plaque and tartar
  • X-ray (if needed) for deeper evaluation
  • Oral hygiene guidance and personalized recommendations

Price starts from IDR 350,000 only! Regular check-ups not only protect your smile but also help prevent more serious health problems.

Smile with Confidence at Altius Hospitals – because prevention is the key to lifelong dental health.

(021) 3000 – 8877

title: Vaccination Package for All Ages
content:
Stay Protected with Altius Vaccination Packages

Vaccines are one of the most effective ways to prevent infectious diseases. Altius Hospitals offers vaccination packages tailored for children, adults, and travelers at special promotional rates.

Our medical team ensures that every vaccination is carried out safely, comfortably, and according to international health standards.

Available Vaccines

  • Childhood Vaccines – MMR, Polio, Hepatitis B, DPT
  • Adult Vaccines – Influenza, Hepatitis A & B, HPV, Tetanus
  • Travel Vaccines – Yellow Fever, Typhoid, and more

Each package includes consultation with a doctor and post-vaccine monitoring for your safety. Protect yourself and your loved ones today.

Because prevention is always better than cure – invest in your health with Altius Hospitals.

(021) 3000 – 8877

title: Eye Health Screening Package
content:
See the World Clearly with Altius Hospitals

Good vision is crucial for your daily life. Our Eye Health Screening Package is designed to detect vision problems, cataracts, or glaucoma at an early stage.

Early detection can prevent further damage and maintain long-term eye health.

Package Includes:

  • Consultation with an ophthalmologist
  • Visual acuity test to measure eyesight sharpness
  • Tonometry (eye pressure test) to detect glaucoma risk
  • Slit lamp examination for detailed eye structure evaluation

Price starts from IDR 750,000. With the latest diagnostic equipment and skilled specialists, we are committed to providing the best care for your eyes.

Your Vision, Our Care – because clear sight means a brighter life.

title: Child Growth & Development Screening
content:
Monitor Your Child’s Growth with Altius Hospitals

Children grow rapidly, and monitoring their growth and development is crucial to ensure they reach their full potential. Our screening package provides a complete assessment of your child’s health.

Our pediatric specialists will carefully evaluate your child’s physical growth and developmental milestones, giving you peace of mind as a parent.

What’s Inside?

  • Comprehensive pediatric consultation
  • Height, weight, and BMI assessment
  • Nutritional evaluation and personalized advice
  • Developmental milestone check

This package is highly recommended for children under 12 years old. Special promotional rate: IDR 500,000.

Early check-up for a brighter future – because every child deserves the best start in life.

(021) 3000 – 8877

title: Women’s Health Screening Package
content:
Prioritize Your Health, Ladies!

Women face unique health challenges that require special attention. At Altius Hospitals, we provide a comprehensive Women’s Health Screening Package to help you stay in control of your well-being.

This package is designed to detect common conditions early and provide guidance for long-term health maintenance.

Includes:

  • Gynecological consultation with a specialist
  • Pap smear for cervical cancer screening
  • Breast ultrasound or mammogram
  • Blood tests (hormonal panel & general check-up)

Special promotional price: IDR 1,200,000. With early detection, you can prevent serious conditions and enjoy peace of mind.

Healthier Women, Stronger Future – because your well-being matters at every stage of life.

title: Elderly Health Check Package
content:
Comprehensive Health Screening for Seniors

As we age, the risk of chronic illnesses increases. Regular health checks are essential to maintain quality of life and detect conditions early. Altius Hospitals offers a dedicated package for elderly patients.

Our medical team provides gentle care and thorough assessments to ensure seniors enjoy their golden years in good health.

Package Includes:

  • General practitioner consultation
  • Comprehensive blood tests (cholesterol, glucose, kidney & liver function)
  • Electrocardiogram (ECG) to monitor heart health
  • Bone density test for osteoporosis screening

Special promotional rate starts from IDR 1,500,000. Give your loved ones the gift of long-lasting health and vitality.

Healthy Aging with Altius Hospitals – because growing old should mean growing strong.
